actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow claims for refunds or credits in district courts or the United States Claims Court for estates electing application of section 6166.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow small businesses which are current in their estate tax installment payments to dispute their tax claims of erroneous or illegal assessments in a U.S. District or Claims Court.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow claims for refunds or credits in district courts or the United States Claims Court for estates electing application of section 6166.
